comments.body: bug is in MagicSacrificePermanentsEvent, should use addFirstEvent not addEvent for chained events. Fixed in https://code.google.com/p/magarena/source/detail?r=a43ec67c8f815a8451557432aa00d7cd2522e2dd If the card scripting is buggy, it is better to fix the card scripting than convert individual cards back to groovy code.
